title: Great Arab Minds Committee | His Excellency Mohammad Abdullah Al Gergawi | His Excellency Saeed Al Nazari

quotes: In 2006, His Excellency Mohammad Abdullah Al Gergawi was appointed Minister of Cabinet Affairs of the UAE Government, in addition to his capacity as Deputy Chairman of the Ministerial ‎Development Council (MDC).

Between February 2016 and July 2020, Future Foresight was added to Al Gergawi’s ministerial portfolio, where he was mandated to develop the UAE’s Future Foresight Strategy aiming to promote government readiness for the future.

organizations.name: Great Arab Minds Committee
quotes: The Great Arab Minds initiative is overseen by a committee of leaders tasked with establishing an integrated ecosystem to support brilliant Arab minds and actualize the vision of His Highness Sheikh Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoum, who believes in the role that creative Arab minds play in shaping the future of the Arab people and driving development across their communities to achieve greater prosperity, stability, and sustainable growth.

organizations.name: UAE Government
quotes: In 2006, His Excellency Mohammad Abdullah Al Gergawi was appointed Minister of Cabinet Affairs of the UAE Government, in addition to his capacity as Deputy Chairman of the Ministerial ‎Development Council (MDC).

organizations.name: Ministerial ‎Development Council (MDC)
quotes: In 2006, His Excellency Mohammad Abdullah Al Gergawi was appointed Minister of Cabinet Affairs of the UAE Government, in addition to his capacity as Deputy Chairman of the Ministerial ‎Development Council (MDC).

organizations.name: Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoum Global Initiatives (MBRGI)
quotes: The committee leading the Great Arab Minds initiative is chaired by His Excellency Mohammed bin Abdullah Al Gergawi, UAE Minister of Cabinet Affairs, Great Arab Minds Higher Committee Chairman, and secretary-general of the Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoum Global Initiatives (MBRGI), and His Excellency Saeed Al Nazari as a Secretary General of the Great Arab Minds initiative.
